attributes.action: prosecute mp's that have fraudently used expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any mp who has fraudently used the expense system should be charged with fraud ! the police should be called in to investigate and prosecute all mp's for any claim they have made which has nothing to do with their job.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
